colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @049A *, ,(ZHES CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL ZHING 'PHRIN LAS COL BA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA RNGAMS PA'I SGRA DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MGON KHANG LA BKA' CHEN LUNG RIGS KYIS BSKUL BA'I TSAMS 'BYOR ZHING RANG NYID KYANG DGOD PA CHEN PO BSKUL TE GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR BA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS BRIS PA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
